txt.en: 'Have you hit your head, duvodiad? Go get some rest.'

You have been tasked with travelling to Galtev in Dunland and finding a potential visitor who might accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival. You should look around Galtrev for potential visitors.
Dunlendings bothered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Kh√¢taphos believes that there may be some among the Dunlendings of Galtrev who could use a tropical holiday.
'The islands are calling, and I must go!'
Completed Gathering Guests: Galtrev
'Does such a place truly exist? I must see it for myself!'
'Yes, I must do this thing! Where is my pack?'
You see some potential visitors

'Just north of the Gap of Rohan there is an untamed land called Dunland. It is said to be inhabited by equally untamed hillmen who paint their faces and wear naught but animal skins! I imagine they rarely leave their own lands, but maybe if someone gave them a little nudge, it may do them well to visit other places!

'Go to their largest village, Galtrev, and find someone who might cheerfully accept an invitation. Mind that you do not bother too many people who would not be open to such a journey, or people will think you a pest and grow to have a poor opinion of us.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
You have found potential visitors in Galtrev. You should choose one who is most likely to accept an invitation to visit Furtherholm for the Midsummer Festival and invite them.

'When you are ready, go to Galtrev in Dunland and find someone to invite to visit us in Furtherholm.'
Find potential visitors in Galtrev
Invite someone to visit Furtherholm

Gathering Guests: Galtrev
'Go back to your own clan, duvodiad.'
'Take your nonsense and leave us be, duvodiad!'
